p: The Zingiber plant tissues (leaves, stems, or rhizomes) were collected from north-central Vietnam and the plant tissues subjected to hydrodistillation to obtain the respective essential oils ( Table 1, Figure 1). Gas chromatographic–mass spectral (GC-MS) and gas chromatographic–flame ionization detection (GC-FID) were used to analyze the essential oil compositions, which are compiled in Table 2.
